column4: Are atheros wireless chipsets good? I have a 5212 and it shows up but isn't able to connect...
madifi is great
how can I install this? is there a package available?
Well what is installed... dmesg | grep ath
Marine_, do a ifconfig to see if the device is made
I have the ath_hal restricted drivers installed
are those different than madwifi?
I know that...
is a device made for the card? ath0?
yes, it shows ath0, ath0:avah, and wifi0 under ifconfig
So you need to configure it
I even have an IP address under ath0:avah
and use wpa_supplicant to access the wireless router
I even configured the WEP key in the manager
I can tell you how...
you use wep?
yep
I use wpa never messed with wep
sounds like nothing is wrong with the driver
dunno, I'm trying to help a friend set this up....
if you can configure your access point to use WPA I can help
if not look into wireless-tools
ok, lemme try wireless-tools... lemme grab it and install it first from repo
I got madwifi-tools installed
